description.message: Informs users that Internet Explorer suffers from Flexbox compatibility bugs.

usingFlexWithIE.description: String warning users that flex is used and IE is a target browser
usingFlexWithIE.message:
The Internet Explorer brower versions 11 and older suffer from a number of CSS Flexbox compatibility bugs. The layout on this page may be different between Internet Explorer and other, more recent, browsers. The size or alignment of elements may be incorrect and content may overflow.
Support for older versions of Internet Explorer ended and Microsoft no longer provides security updates or technical support for these versions.
